name: Bib Goes Home
description:
Created for the Dundee V&A game jam, Bib Goes Home is an interactive storybook experience for players of any age. 

Using a projection mapped hand-drawn pop-up book, players can control a bib as he moves around a real book right in front of your eyes.

The game detects when you turn a page automatically - follow bib through the story and help them find their home!

This game is more of an installation piece and unfortunately cannot be played without the pop-up book.

Read the article here
